trans-unit.source: An inline flow content element that causes a line break to occur in flow content.
trans-unit.target: 在流内容中导致换行时机，使内联流内容元素。

trans-unit.source: Use LineBreak to start a new line of text.
trans-unit.target: 使用 LineBreak 启动新的一行文本。

trans-unit.source: Unlike other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Inline> objects, LineBreak does not allow child elements.
trans-unit.target: 与其他不同<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Inline>对象，LineBreak 不允许子元素。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Inline>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, default instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新的默认实例<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak"></xref> class, and inserts the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak"></xref> at a specified position.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak"></xref>类，并将插入新<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak"></xref>中指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> specifying an insertion position at which to insert the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak"></xref> element after it is created, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for no automatic insertion.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref>指定要插入的插入位置<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak"></xref>元素，它在创建后或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>以表示不自动插入。
